pullRequest.title: Treatment SQL performs well on multi-study queries
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #8063
Describe changes proposed in this pull request:

Filter cancer study before filtering by study, sample id pairs

nodes.bodyText: might be cleaner if the unique/distinct step can be done in mysql in some way. Looks slightly odd when studyIds are given as argument twice imo, though not a big deal

Could you try this and see if it works
 <foreach item="item" collection="@java.util.Arrays@stream(studyIds.toArray()).distinct().collect(@java.util.stream.Collectors.toList())" open="(" separator="," close=")">
    #{item}
 </foreach>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -99,7 +99,11 @@
                     </foreach>
                 </if>
                 <if test="@java.util.Arrays@stream(studyIds.toArray()).distinct().count() > 1">
-                    (cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER, sample.STABLE_ID) IN
+                    cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER IN
+                    <foreach item="item" collection="uniqueStudyIds" open="(" separator="," close=")">

commit.message:
Treatment SQL performs well on multi-study queries
- Filter cancer study before filtering by study, sample id pairs
